Room.Name: Leviathan Drive/Tranquility Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Tranquility Way and Leviathan Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Tranquility Way runs east from the intersection with Leviathan Drive, heading north and south. To the west, you can see the magnificent Avatar Ruins, a mysterious formation caused by the massive destructive forces of the Avatars many eons ago.
